Key: ...*Gasp*!
Where... am I?
School... hallway...?
This isn't good. I can't remember anything.
I must have left the classroom to go somewhere.
Hey, Itsuka. There you are.
Huh?
What's the matter? Are you in a daze or something?
Oh. Tonomachi. What's the matter?
What do you mean? I was looking for you.
Hm? What do you want?

Nothing at all. But you should know a certain club
senpai is looking for you. I just came by to deliver
the message since I figured you missed me too.
Hm? Club? Tonomachi, you're in a club?

Yeah! One might argue that I'm the MVP of the ol'
swim team, despite what others might think.

Swim team? I bet you anything you're after girls'
swimsuits, aren't you? God, you're so predictable.
Well, that is true! But... HEY! You're a member, too!
Oh... that's right, I am...

(He's right. Tonomachi and I joined the swim team
together. We both said something about... wanting to
be more free.)
Ah... So I was heading to the swim club.
...What's gotten into you, Itsuka?
Nothing.

You're pouting because you couldn't enter the swim
meet, aren't you?
Swim meet?

Yeah. The one we were timed for the other day. The
one where you didn't qualify?
Oh, really?

Itsuka, now isn't the time to be nonchalant. With that
kind of attitude, you really won't be able to enter.
Don't forget how mad Tama-chan got at you for it.
Oh... Come to think of it, you're right.
Really now. You're a swimmer, not a surfer.
Well... Uh, don't worry about me.
That's probably why your times aren't improving.
You could be right.
But, thanks to that you're... Ugh, damn it!
What's the matter?

Don't give me that, you con-artist! I told you our
senpai is calling for you. She wants to talk to you
specifically about your times.
Talk...? So, who wants to talk to me?

Argh! Damn it! I'm so bitter! I don't even want to
tell you anymore!
Uh, tell me...

Miku-tan Senpai, you idiot! The one with the big
boobies! The ace of the swim team! She said she
wants to talk to you on the rooftop! Alone!
Oh.
Why don't you care?! Ugh, I'm so jealous.
You're so honest about your desires...

Shut up! I mean it's Miku-tan Senpai we're talking
about! All of us on the team joined because of her!
Why do you get all her attention?!

But she's going to talk to me about my time, right?
That means she's going to scold me...

(And what does he mean, I get all her attention? I
don't remember getting any attention...)

Yeah! Lucky bastard! What I wouldn't give to see
Miku-tan all hot and bothered about me!

Oh, sure, sure... Anyways, I guess I'll go see what
she has to say. The rooftop, right?
What?! Hey?! Don't ignore me. Hey!

(Hm... I heard him keep talking, but whatever. It's
Tonomachi.)
Damn it! I hope you get cursed!

(I'm going to ignore his negativity and focus on going
upstairs.)
(Well, here I am.)
(Senpai will be here, right?)
Hm? That's...
There you are, darling. I was waiting for you!

Just as Tonomachi said, the one that approached me
was... Um, how do I put it... A student with large
breasts.
Senpai... right? Of the swim club.
That's right, darling.
Um... You call me darling?
Yes. What about it?
Well you don't call the others that...
Huh? But your name is darling, isn't it?
*Cough*! Of course that's not my name!

What? Really～? I always thought it was something
like Gagaring or Sterling. Some name like that, you
know～
What am I, some foreigner?! I'm 100% Japanese.

Oh is that so～ But I remember you as darling～
Listen to it. The way it flows out of my mouth...
It suits you.

But, why did you remember me as that in the first
place...

But I can't change it now～ Can't we just say darling
is your nickname?
Fine... This is tiring, so whatever. Go ahead.
(It feels pointless trying to argue with her...)
Hey, darling? Let's cut to the chase.
Sure. So you want to talk about...

The meet, darling. I heard you didn't meet the
minimum time to enter the race.
I-I heard...

At this rate, you'd be the only person on our team
who can't enter.
O-Oh. So I'm the only reject...?
That's right～ Your friend Tonomachi-kun is the ace...
What? What did you just say...?
I told you, Tonomachi-kun is our great ace.

What?! No way! That's a lie! THE TONOMACHI?!
I mean, are we talking about the same guy here?!

I'm not lying～ Judging by his time, I'm sure this
meet will be his chance to aim for a personal best～

What... I never thought Tonomachi would beat me at
that. For some reason, it's really disturbing...
Right? Then you have to practice.

O-Okay... But practicing now would probably be too
late.

There's still time to enter, so if you train hard, you
can improve!

Train hard... If that's what's going to make me
faster.
Let's do it, darling. I'll practice with you.
You... will?

Well, I'll do some one-on-one coaching with you until
the meet. Brace yourself!
What?! You will?! I mean, one-on-one with you?!
It'll be our secret training.
The two of us?!
Yes, the two of us!
What... Well, that kind of makes me happy.

Hehe. I'm glad～ So, let's start. How about to warm
up... 100 push ups, 100 sit ups, 100 squats, and...

What?! H-Hey, that's pretty hardcore from the get-go!
I mean, this is the rooftop!
No questions asked. Now start!
O-Okay!
*Wheeze, wheeze*...
Okay, this is the perfect warm-up.

*Pant, pant*... This is... a warm-up... I'm at my
limit...

What are you talking about, darling? You have to do
at least this much every day, or your time won't
improve～ So let's go and practice at the pool now.
...Th-This is harder... than I anticipated...
Now, darling. Have you changed?
Y-Yes...
(Of course she's in her swimsuit, too. Her figure...)
What's the matter, darling? Let's get started.

Yes, Boo... I mean, uh... W-We're going to get in the
water?

Yes～ But before that, which race do you want to
enter?
Which race? Oh yeah, huh...

Depending on which one you're going to do, the
practice menu will be different so we should decide
on that first.
(Hm...Which one should I enter?)
Freestyle.
Backstroke.
Relay with Senpai.
I was thinking the freestyle.
Freestyle, huh? I think that'll be fine.
Y-You think?

Looking at your personal best, I think you'd have the
best chance at the freestyle.
I-I thought so, too. Freestyle is my only chance!

And besides, I also feel like freestyle is the best in
general. I think a man that's fast at freestyle is
amazing～
Oh, those words. Totally pumping me up!
*Giggle*... Then let's give it our all!
Okay!

(Whoa.. At first I was worried, but I feel like she's
cheering me on. Now I feel like I can do it.)

(I mean, the swim team ace—Miku-senpai—is going
to train me herself.)
(Alone. Just the two of us!)
All right, let's stretch and get in the water...
What's the matter, darling?
(Because I had unnecessary things on my mind...)
(I'm super conscious of Senpai's body...!)
Hey, darling?!
Y-Yes?!
Don't look at me like that! I'm getting embarrassed!
*Grunt*... Sorry. I let my guard down...
Gosh... You bad boy～ Now, let's start practice.
O-Okay. I'll do my best.
I want to do the backstroke.
So you prefer the backside, darling?

What?! Backside...? I don't know if... I prefer it or
not...
Darling, is there something wrong?
Huh? What are you talking about?

Gosh, darling. I was talking about the backstroke.
Where you swim on your backside"!"

Huh? Oh yeah. Of course I'm talking about swimming,
too. Well, I like the backside. Yes.
Is that true? Gosh...

Y-Yeah. See, you know how when you're doing a
backstroke, you're on your back? I like to look up at
the stars while I swim in the outdoor pool.
What... darling...
...Did I say something weird?

No. You have the same reasoning as me...! The
reason why I like the backstroke.
Oh, you too?
Yes, so my backside is really developed!
I-I see.

But, hmm... If you like backstrokes, then I can totally
teach you.
That's nice, but please go easy on me...
No. If I'm teaching you, I need you to hit your time.
Ahhh!
Now, let's go. Follow me, darling!

I would like to do the relay with you. It has to be
you.
Darling... You're so serious...
Please Senpai. I... I'll do it!
But, darling... I'm sorry...
Y-You don't want to...?

You see, there are no relays in this meet... Not to
mention they wouldn't pair a male and a female
together.
I-I knew that...!

It's touching to hear you say that, but let's not mess
around. Let's be serious, okay?
S-Sorry!

Gosh. So, let's have you enter the freestyle. That'll
be the most promising.
Okay, let's go with that.
Let's do this, darling.
Okay, Senpai. Please train me!

(Practicing alone with her. Although she was strict,
it was such a nice time spent together...)
